description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows kernel elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-30068):

1. Download and apply the relevant update package corresponding to your system version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5039212](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039212)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5039212](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039212)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5039211](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5039211](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211)

2. Restart your system after the installation to ensure the updates remain effective.

**Details**:
- This update addresses the kernel flaw related to out-of-bounds read which could allow elevation of privilege.
- Ensure that you have administrative privileges to install these updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
